# App name tour.app.name=Tour

# Steps TourCode.StepClass_order=Order TourCode.StepClass_element=Element (CSS selector that identify an element) TourCode.StepClass_title=Title TourCode.StepClass_content=Content TourCode.StepClass_backdrop=Backdrop TourCode.StepClass_placement=Placement TourCode.StepClass_targetPage=Target Page TourCode.StepClass_action=Target Action TourCode.StepClass_queryString=Query String tour.steps=Steps tour.steps.new_step=New step tour.steps.add_step=Add step tour.steps.edit_step=Edit step tour.steps.save_step=Save tour.steps.delete_confirm=Are you sure you want to delete the step? tour.steps.delete_done=Delete step done! tour.steps.deleting=Deleting step... tour.steps.yes=Yes tour.steps.no=No tour.steps.edit=Edit tour.steps.delete=Delete
